description: The century plant, or Agave victoriae-reginae, is truly an amazing species. Native to Mexico, this hardy, drought-tolerant succulent can live for decades, giving it its namesake status. It produces vibrantly colored yellow-green flower spikes that can reach up to 18 feet in height, providing a stunning addition to any garden. The deep green foliage creates a unique, architectural look that can be enjoyed all year round. With a little TLC and protection from frost, the century plant can be a beautiful and lasting addition to your outdoor space.
